job.title: DevOps Engineer
job.description: at starbucks our mission is to inspire and nurture the human spirit one person one cup and one neighborhood at a time starbucks technologists work to achieve this mission using cuttingedge technology delivered to our partners customers stores roasters and global communities this job contributes to starbucks success by delivering highquality reliable and stable technologies in support of the starbucks global technology platform this position is accountable for problem identification and analysis problem resolution and system lifecycle management in addition to providing first and second level support of a continuously operational production environment the technologist in this role will create and implement automation to perform operations tasks and to prevent and respond to incidents across teams an effective devops engineer will develop and share subject matter expertise and gain experience by partnering with senior system engineers outside their teamltbrgtltbrgtmodels and acts in accordance with starbucks guiding principlesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtsummary of key responsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtresponsibilities and essential job functions include but are not limited to the followingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggttechnical design and implementationltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligtwith support from the application development team develops software tools to solve technology operations problems ensures solutions are secure durable scalable flexible and accessible proactively mitigates against production support issuesltligt ltligtproposes opportunities for automation to prevent and respond to incidents to improve security to improve data integrity and to help application owners successfully manage their environments ltligt ltligtlearning to build incrementally with an eye toward vision of the final product assists in prototypes with innovative ideas for complex problems provides transparency in approach and progress throughout the processltligt ltligtparticipates in requirements gathering assists with systems approach helps with project initiation contributes to functional design and delivers technical design and developmentltligt ltligtautomates test coverage per platform capabilities and requirements assists with manual system and integration testing effortsltligt ltligtlearns to operate effectively in both waterfall and agile software development lifecycle sdlc processes and methodologiesltligt ltbrgtltulgtltstronggtproduction support ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltugtapplication and platform componentsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtdiagnoses troubleshoots and remediates incidents and problems to support the tools created and owned by the operations team participates in root cause analysis efforts to identify and implement solutions to operational issuesltligt ltligtmaintains and reports operational key performance indicators kpis on items such as performance service incidents and tickets set forth by the organization leadershipltligt ltligtcreates and maintains documentation supporting training system administration deployment and operational processes and proceduresltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtoperations supportltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtparticipates in oncall rotation for x environmentltligt ltligtprovides system support working trouble tickets and escalating to teammates according to priority and required expertise queue completing resolution within sla ltligt ltligtassists in incident resolution leveraging predefined work instructions for issue remediation ltligt ltligtinvestigates and provides root cause analysis for incidents ltligt ltligtfulfills service requests and writes scripts automating the fulfillment of service requests ltligt ltligtengages with vendors in support of incidents as neededltligt ltligtidentifies operating system problems takes corrective action and refers problems or issues to second or third level support groups as required uses established escalation proceduresltligt ltligtdocuments problems in the problem management system extracts statistics on errors or problems and prepares reports on trends ltligt ltligtrepresents department as a participant in application development change management production readiness reviews and other special projects as required ltligt ltbrgtltulgtltstronggtleadership ltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligtshares knowledge freely assisting teammates in learning coding systems engineering etc helping to raise the overall skill level of the teamltligt ltligtreceptive and responsive to coaching and guidance from leaders and more experienced application development engineers from other teams seeks input and support as required begins working in an increasingly selfdirected manner ltligt ltligtprovides constructive input and perspective to team conversations ltligt ltbrgtltulgtltstronggtsystem admin specific competencies for role ltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligtinstall configure test and maintain operating systems application software and system management tools ltligt ltligtmonitor and test application performance for potential bottlenecks identify possible solutions and assist application owners with implementing fixes ltligt ltligttier and tier management and monitoring all installed systems and infrastructure pertinent to specified role eg physical server virtual servers storage firmware preengineered systems os monitoringapp performance software desktop hardwareos general end user infrastructure front line support ltligt ltligtuse console management incident management and job scheduler software applications ltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtbasic qualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtsummary of experienceltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligt years of professional industry experience with software development ltligt ltligt years experience with systems administration across both linux or other ltligtexcellent verbal and written communication skillsltligt ltligtstrong analytical and problemsolving skillsltligt ltligtability to balance multiple priorities and meet deadlinesltligt
